reviews.review_msg: The class was taken online due to the pandemic. However, Clare kept the live lectures interesting and interactive. Whereas, the recorded lectures could be dry at times. Overall, Clare is a passionate professor who gives detailed feedback and is constantly trying to get the best out of her students. Highly recommend taking classes with her.

I really enjoyed taking Clare's class and I would recommend her as a prof! She's a great lecturer, provides important resources for her students to succeed as well as truly cares about her students. I think she is very knowledgable about what she teaches and enjoys hearing opinions and ideas from students. One my favourite profs I've ever had!!!

Upper division classes (330, 332, 421W) are very interesting. Follow the assignment guides and you will do well. Always gives adequate written feedback for why you got a certain grade which you can use to improve future assignments. Don't be afraid to speak up in class. Clare is very accessible during office hours!

Great prof. Incorporates a lot of group work and discussion into lecture to make it interesting. Fair marker and provides lots of good feedback in office hours. 10/10 would recommend taking any of her classes.
